data.name: Far Lands
data.detailed_description:
Far Lands is a lightweight survival open-world game.

Lore:

You wake up and find out you are not home. In fact, what was home? There is no memory of that.

You are on a strange island and there is no time for panicking. Surviving is your only option. You start gathering food, crafting tools and building a base until you encounter something nobody sees every day.... A LIVING SKELETON! He starts attacking and you do too. He's dead for now... but who can assure he was the only one?

To find answers you start exploring more and more of the island, but the you only get more questions. Why are there are human build areas? Why there is no human life signs if there are human build areas? What was that skeleton?

Why is there... A PORTAL?

Features:


  • Character hunger and thirst mechanics
  • Crafting
  • Gathering resources
  • Procedural Spawning of resources and loot
  • Hunting wildlife and fighting creatures
  • Base Building
  • Farming crops
  • Day/Night Cycle
  • Weather changes
  • Multi-dimensional travel

The game is lightweight on mechanics because we feel the player would enjoy the adventure and having fun more.

data.short_description: Far Lands is a lightweight SURVIVAL open world game. Build and defend your base from creatures. Gather resources, craft better gear and discover new DIMENSIONS.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: i3 4000 series
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 6600 or ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains violence like hunting animals and killing creatures (e.g. skeletons).
Blood splashes when mobs take damage.
